content:
Welcome!

This course module was created to give an understanding of the motivations and the core principles behind the edX platform.

In this first course module, we will explore some of the learning sciences that are foundational to the design of edX’s core platform.

This is still in a prototype/pilot stage. Please pardon the rough edges (but as you find them, let me know about them, or otherwise what you think at

>pmitros@edx.org)

This course is available under an open license, and the OLX is available on
>github. This version is in the pmitros/partners-version branch.
